about_the_game:
Get a thousand of free 3D animation clips. In just a few clicks you can create video clips, movies, live action videos, animation, image art, visual novels, stories, manga, comics, wallpapers or just have a fun making characters behave as you would like. Specially created for beginners, non-designers, professionals and artists to bring your stories to life.

With DLC Animation for Clip Maker you will get the following animations:


Fighting (243 Animations)
Ninja Dark Shadow (54 Animations)
Punches 01 (145 Animations)
Crafting (149 Animations)
Female Dance (18 Animations)
Mobility (527 Animations)
Pedestrian Walks (80 Animations)
Survival (81 Animations)
Sword fight (41 Animations)
Medieval 2 hand weapon female (71 Animations)
Medieval 2 hand weapon male (71 Animations)
Medieval 2 weapon female (87 Animations)
Medieval 2 weapon male (87 Animations)
Medieval bow female (66 Animations)
Medieval bow male (66 Animations)
Medieval general female (170 Animations)
Medieval general male (170 Animations)
Medieval halberd female (81 Animations)
Medieval halberd male (81 Animations)
Medieval horseman female (64 Animations)
Medieval horseman male (64 Animations)
Medieval weapon and shield female (72 Animations)
Medieval weapon and shield male (72 Animations)
Medieval wizard female (79 Animations)
Medieval wizard male (79 Animations)
Mocap (2 500 Animations)
Spunky moves animations (86 Animations)
Office work animations (43 Animations)
Family and Friends animations (34 Animations)
Pistol animations (168 Animations)
Scared animations (60 Animations)
Yoga animations (17Animations)

All content of this DLC will be available directly from the game, in the menu where you are making settings of the timeline.

name: Animation for Clip maker

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 or later (64-BIT Required!!!) It is not working on 32-BIT systems!
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 / AMD FX 8350
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Get a thousand of free 3D animation clips. In just a few clicks you can create video clips, movies, live action videos, animation, image art, visual novels, stories, manga, comics or just have a fun making characters behave as you would like. Beginners and professionals can bring stories to life.
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Czech, Danish, Dutch, Finnish, Greek, Hungarian, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese - Portugal, Romanian, Russian, Simplified Chinese, Swedish, Thai, Traditional Chinese, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese
